tosdr.case: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

5197.quoteText: 2.6. Age Requirement for End Users. The Cloud Products are not intended for, and should not be used by, anyone under the age of 16.
5197.title: This service is only available to users at or over the age of 16

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users of a certain age
tosdr.tldr: The Cloud Terms of Service specifies that, "The Cloud Products are not intended for, and should not be used by, anyone under the age of 16. You are responsible for ensuring that all End Users are at least 16 years old."

5198.quoteText: 2.5. Credentials. You must require that all End Users keep their user IDs and passwords for the Cloud Products strictly confidential and do not share such information with any unauthorized person. User IDs are granted to individual, named persons and may not be shared. You are responsible for any and all actions taken using End User Accounts and passwords, and you agree to immediately notify us of any unauthorized use of which you become aware.
5198.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

tosdr.case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

5202.quoteText: For performance and analytics.  These cookies and similar technologies collect information on how users interact with the Services and enable us to improve how the Services operate. For example, we use Google Analytics cookies to help us understand how visitors arrive at and browse our products and website to identify areas for improvement such as navigation, user experience, and marketing campaigns.
5202.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

5203.quoteText: If you do not accept cookies, however, you may not be able to use all aspects of our Services.
5203.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

5204.quoteText: Atlassian and our third party partners also collect information using web beacons (also known as "tracking pixels").
5204.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

5208.quoteText: We also communicate with you about new product offers, promotions and contests.  You can control whether you receive these communications as described below under "Opt-out of communications."
5208.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications

5210.quoteText: • Social media cookies. These cookies are used when you share information using a social media sharing button or “like” button on our websites or you link your account or engage with our content on or through a social media site. The social network will record that you have done this. This information may be linked to targeting/advertising activities.
5210.title: The service uses third party tracking pixels to track social media conversion

tosdr.case: The service uses third party tracking pixels to track social media conversion
